website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a quality cleanser at a low price point, Paula's choice is your choice.
pros: Unlike most cream-based cleansers, this one does not leave any residue on the skin
Effectively evens out your skin tone with regular use
This fragrance-free product leaves skin soft and dewy
It works efficiently at removing even full-coverage foundations
The bottle is quite large and sits at a reasonably low price point
cons: The product doesn't lather, giving the sensation that you're rubbing lotion into the skin

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I've rosacea and so far no problems with this cleanser. It doesn't foam, it's more of a cream to milk cleanser. It makes my skin soft and afterwards, when I use toner on a cotton pad, there is no dirt left behind, so I know it's doing its job. The scent isn't overpowering, but it is there, so if you have a high sensitivity to fragrance that is something to consider - perhaps check out The Ordinary's Squalene cleanser as it's quite similar but with simpler ingredients. This cleanser comes in a decent-sized bottle so it is a good value for the money IMO.
customer_reviews.author: RDK

customer_reviews.title: Caused a rash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cleanser to help with my dry, sensitive skin. After a couple of weeks of use I started getting small pimples, and then a rash about double the size of a quarter appeared on the top of my forehead. I suspected it was the cleanser causing this because the rash had a clear line on its top edge where the headband I wear when I wash my face would be. I cannot recommend this product even though it did make my skin less dry.
customer_reviews.author: jjy

customer_reviews.title: Helped My Dry Irritated Skin A LOT!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair, sensitive, dry-prone skin and I’d been noticing my cheeks were red and irritated and blotchy. I switched from a daily exfoliant to this product hoping it would help alleviate some of the irritation and redness- and I was not disappointed. I started to notice a difference the very first day. The product felt smooth and gently cleansing and left my skin feeling moisturized. I’ve only been using the product a few days and I’ve noticed my skin has visibly started to calm down. I’ve purchased the corresponding moisturizer and I’ll be trying that as well to see if it helps. Cannot tell you how grateful I am to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie88

customer_reviews.title: Great for red, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love the thick, creamy consistency and it really soothes my irritable skin. I've only used it for 2 days and I love it. It doesn't take much effort to remove my makeup and my skin feels smooth and hydrated after using it. I was happy about how big the bottle is. It'll save me on packaging and last a long time. I think I'll be ordering it again, especially if it does help with my redness.
customer_reviews.author: LVallee

customer_reviews.title: Too overpriced for the amount of product
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked this face wash for it’s soothing qualities. It used to be all I used. Since then, i’ve moved on to drugstore cleansers, that I like just as well or better. This used to come in a large bottle, for a much cheaper price. Now it’s an expensive small bottle. It’s definately overpriced, but it’s a good face wash. I really miss the old Paula’s Choice. I swore by it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary526

customer_reviews.title: You'll get Holliwood Actress skin!!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this cleanser! Huge bottle. Hard to spend $28 on this, but honestly this product does everything! Evens out skin tone, helps with cold weather skin issues, moisturizes, helps with patchiness from sun, working out, etc. keeps skin clean & completely clear. Use with the matching toner & you'll get Holliwood Actress skin!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reston, VA

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser, great for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Paula’s Choice for over 16 years...since reading Don’t Go To The Cosmetics Counter Without Me (Paula’s book). At 45, the skin on my face and neck seem to be aging well. I get compliments when people find out my age, but that could be folks being polite. I have dry skin & use the Skin Recovery moisturizer, and the SPF 30 daytime. I also alternate the AHA & BHA treatments.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY SOMETHING THAT WORKS (I have Rosacea)
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dry out my skin, doesn't make me break out, cleans my face, takes all the makeup off, leaves me feeling clean and ready for bed. Finally the long search ends. I have combination skin, oily, dry, everything, PLUS rosacea. Yeah. So thank goodness this exists.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: My favorite face wash to date
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash to date. I have dry skin, so most of the cleansers I tried just left my skin feeling dry. This is a very mild cleanser that gets the job done and leaves my skins feeling good. I do still put lotion on after I clean my face to keep it hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and can only use non lathering cream cleansers. The brand I used for years was discontinued so I have tried a few since. This is the one I will be sticking with.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ketterer

customer_reviews.title: I have rosacea and have to be careful with face ...
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and have to be careful with face products. This one does the job with no redness afterwards, YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! I have had way too many issues with my skin (extreme redness, sensitive, dry, oily, acne, large pore, flaky), so I bought this just to try. I didn't expect much because I could never find the right product all these years, too many let down. After the first wash, I could already feel the difference. My skin now looks and feels so much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. I was thrilled to discover it came in a huge shampoo-sized bottle and that I was pretty set for ages. I'm able to even wash my eye makeup with it, which is pretty sweet action.
customer_reviews.author: Jakfruit

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin (sensitive to harsh chemicals, soaps, fragrances, etc.). I have used this cleanser for years and love it. I always get compliments on how good my skin looks.
customer_reviews.author: C Jung

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser because the texture reminds me of cold cream.....it's very thick, and when you add water with your fingertips, it lathers up really well and cleanses very well. I will continue to buy this for my daily cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice cleanser though
customer_reviews.text: Soothing but not necessarily something that has helped redness go away. It's a nice cleanser though. Wife likes it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew E.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at how good this is!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, I get rosacea outbreaks and have super sensitive skin. That said, this works, no outbreaks, keeps skin very soft, will order again!
customer_reviews.author: P. Batton

customer_reviews.title: I think it's great! It has made my skin feel so soft ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's great! It has made my skin feel so soft and it helps to heal any acne bumps that come up. I can tell a positive difference since using this cleanser 3 weeks ago. It's great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Works well for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I've been suffering from dry skin and bad breakouts and this face wash is really helping. It's very gentle and makes me skin feel fresh and smooth
customer_reviews.author: julian lucas

customer_reviews.title: Along with this amazing cleanser, I use a Paula's toner
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on the proper routine (and products to use). Along with this amazing cleanser, I use a Paula's toner, chemical exfoliant, face cream, and occasionally a serum. My skin has never looked better! It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Unhemmed Sky

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite beauty products. It cleans makeup residue off the face without drying it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! It cleans your face without leaving a residue and does not irritate your skin. It is better than even more pricy cleansers, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it. I don't wear a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. I don't wear a lot of makeup, but the makeup I do wear didn't come off with this cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Cat J

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I got this last year in the white bottle was great. Reordered came in a maroon bottle texture is off and face nresking out horrible. This has to be a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly g. sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product 💛
customer_reviews.text: Great exfoliating action! But a bit to harsh for my overly mature dry skin. I found the anti redness for really dry skin works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: wendosch

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. It’s been perfect for my very dry and sensitive skin! Great for my rosacea as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nicole Routte

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing to my rosacea... waste of time and $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. It's so good for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry, sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive, dry skin. I'm serious when I say NOTHING has worked, not in 10 years of experimenting with different cleansers, AHA, BHA, masks, exfoliants, moisturizers. But I've had this cleanser (at Reddit's recommendation) for a few weeks and my skin looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My eyes are very sensitive and this cream makes my eyes burn and tear up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleanser for Dry, Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is really my favorite cleanser I have EVERY used. I keep buying it since it's the only cleanser that seems to work with my skin. No redness, no tightness, no dryness. It's even gentle enough to use twice a day. The creamy texture helps too, so it doesn't feel like soap going on.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it seems like a really great product so far
customer_reviews.text: This product is definately very gentle on the skin, there is no scent and it is white. My boyfriend said however it didnt get his skin clean enough, I would suggest rubbing it in with a damp washcloth a little bit to get a thoroughly clean skin! Other than that it seems like a really great product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Paula's Choice Skin Recovery
customer_reviews.text: Nice product very gentle on my face. I have Rosacia but can't really notice any improvement from using it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems to cleanse well and doe not irritate your eyes when removing make up
customer_reviews.author: Jean Caisse

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible, it has too much alcohol
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible, it has too much alcohol. If you have rosacea don't order it. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paula's choice skin recovery cleanser.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is softer, lines appear minimized since I began using this cleaner. I will purchase again and switch from my other face wash for now.
customer_reviews.author: devorah

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping this would be a more affordable alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a more affordable alternative to Clinique's redness solution face wash. But I think Clinique is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing that has worked for my mom's rosacea
customer_reviews.text: A MIRACLE for my mom's catastrophically sensitive, highly allergic rosacea-plagued skin. She was scared to try it because she's had such severe allergic reactions to skin products that she had to go on a course of steroids! Within days the color and texture improved, no more blemishes, and the longer she uses it the better her skin looks.
customer_reviews.author: LLS

customer_reviews.title: Help for dry rosacea-prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is going on with my skin but it has become so dry, maybe age and hormones (I'm 46). I can't seem to find that holy grail that moisturizes enough but this is a good start. It's rich, no fragrance, and washes off nicely. It leaves my skin fairly supple and no heavy residue. My skin feels clean which is a nice surprise since a lot of cream cleansers don't. Paula's Choice is a great line for me and my dry rosacea skin.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleGal

customer_reviews.title: my mistake
customer_reviews.text: I guess I shouldn't give it a one--because I didn't see that it contains soybean oil. Soy causes my face to get redder. I don't know with all of the controversy surrounding the constant exposure to products that contain soy why they just don't use maybe coconut oil, olive oil, etc. instead.
customer_reviews.author: hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin and eyes
customer_reviews.text: This my favorite cream cleanser! I have dryer skin and the skin around my eyes is very sensitive which makes makeup removal not very fun. Most other cleansers that are labeled "for sensitive skin" still leave my eye area super dry. This one does not do that, it's very moisturizing and unscented. My eyeliner and mascara comes off nicely with this cleanser. I sometimes have to a second round of this on my eyes, but it doesn't irritate them at all. I would definitely recommend to those with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: I have really sensitive skin, and this does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin, and this does not irritate it. Tip: you need only the tiniest amount to cover your face, or else you'll be rinsing it off forever. I use a pea-sized amount and gently massage my face in circles to distribute the product evenly. At the rate I'm going through it, it will last 2 years. One star left off because I was hoping for some redness reduction, and it doesn't provide that.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Roland-Springer

customer_reviews.title: I like!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of redness around eyes and nose. I got this because I read this cleanser was good for that. I didn't notice a big change in amount of redness but this cleanser gets all make up off and leaves my skin soft and hydrated. I use a facial brush with this cleanser as well. Even in this winter cold it hydrates!
customer_reviews.author: Rone Galeone

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. It also isn't drying at all. It cleanses well. The problem is it doesn't really improve my skin either. I've noticed no reduction in redness or acne.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S.

customer_reviews.title: It Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser! It is silky, thick, and gentle. Definitely helps soften my skin, which often felt like sandpaper before. I have dry skin that always felt rough and I was often tempted to use scrubs, even though I don't think they're very good for my skin in the long run. Now my skin feels smooth after cleansing and I'm able to avoid scrubs completely.
customer_reviews.author: KittySneakers

customer_reviews.title: Customer for life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stuff! I have adult acne and normally I use cerave cleanser because my skin gets inflamed rather easily. However I needed a cleanser that actually removes makeup. My friend recommended this to me and I love it! I use it at night before bed and use the cerave on the morning. It's a tiny bit drying but it's still so gentle and actually takes my makeup off!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Calm skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have really bad rosacea and just after a couple of uses my skin feels calm and clean. I am anxious to try the rest of her products.
customer_reviews.author: erisgroup

customer_reviews.title: I have really sensitive skin and rosacea and have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin and rosacea and have tried hundreds of dollars worth of product. This is the first face wash that doesn't cause issues and clears my skin right up
customer_reviews.author: ac5

customer_reviews.title: removes makeup
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for two years. I used to use their eco soap. I still like it but for my dry skin I like the cream texture.
customer_reviews.author: John.P.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I love Paula’s choice, gentle on my skin and leaves my skin feeling clean but not rough
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Keenan

customer_reviews.title: I don't really like it. It feels as if I am "washing" ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like it. It feels as if I am "washing" my face with a creme/lotion. It doesn't seem to hurt my skin, but I am not sure it's doing me any good. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elke Fehling

customer_reviews.title: This is my go-to cleanser. Because of having rosacea ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to cleanser. Because of having rosacea, to find a creamy cleanser took a while. This one is very gentle for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gentle cleanser for my super sensitive skin. Doesn't irritate my skin and cleans really well. It removes my makeup and doesn't leave my skin feeling dry. I will be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to help with rosacea, but didn't see any benefit from it.
customer_reviews.author: P. McCord

customer_reviews.title: Very drying
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for several weeks. It does remove dirt and make up well. However, I am going to purchase something else and throw the remainder away as it has dried my face out terribly.
customer_reviews.author: Nkrp3602

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!!! All my acne is gone! No scent
customer_reviews.author: chrissy levin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cleanser! I have rosacea and bought the cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleanser! I have rosacea and bought the cleanser, moisturizer and toner in this line. I love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: great product must
customer_reviews.text: AH-mazing ive tried many mmannnyyy products fr my sensitive acne prone dry skin this has been greatttttt. my skin is seriously balanced and ive recently suffered temporary steriod-induced rosacea . great product must have
customer_reviews.author: Mystique

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Calming for Skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite skin cleanser. Very gentle and calming for my skin
customer_reviews.author: Back to Nature and Books

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for rosacea, but sometimes I wasn't sure how 'clean' my face felt after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sjolin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin soft and clean. Doesn't dry out skin, but doesn't leave it oily either.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Still looking
customer_reviews.text: No real difference since my skin is still dry. Cleans nicely though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is perfect for my skin. It is very soft and my skin looks and feels very refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Emmrich

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent non-drying cleanser for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent non-drying cleanser for sensitive skin, creamy enough to remove light makeup (heavier makeup may need a remover).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: still trying to find something that works for me. I still use this occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: For my sensitive skin, I say no as it makes my red spots redder and I had couple of breakouts. Seems like a decent product though but just not for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leta Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love this line!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Has cleared my face up snd leaves it feeling soft and hydrated!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I have super sensitive skin and need to avoid excessive rubbing
customer_reviews.text: This was a very thick cleanser that did not clean off my makeup or even rinse off completely without the use of a washcloth. I have super sensitive skin and need to avoid excessive rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing results
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. I bought the entire line of Paula's Choice products for my skin type, but it only caused irritation and redness, as well as the occasional burning sensation on my face. This cleanser didn't really cleanse. My face still felt dirty after use. I tried to use more of the product, but nothing helped. It doesn't clean well and still leaves my skin feeling dry. I have dry skin with mild acne and the dryness and acne only got worse while using this. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hankins

product_meta.title: Paula's Choice SKIN RECOVERY Cream Cleanser, 8 Ounce Bottle for Extra Sensitive, Redness and Rosacea Prone Skin, Normal to Very Dry Facial Skin
feature_bullets: SKIN-SOFTENING FACIAL CLEANSER: This rich formula thoroughly hydrates and soothes dry skin to reduce dullness and the appearance of redness. Works thoroughly but gently to comfort dry to very dry skin while visibly improving skin's softness and suppleness

Paula's Choice SKIN RECOVERY Facial Cleanser is a richly hydrating skin-soothing face wash that is easily rinsed off with water to leave the face feeling smoother, softer, and cleanly comfortable. Formulated to be gentle for sensitive skin prone to dryness, even skin prone to eczema.

Use our gentle, effective cleanser daily as the first step in your morning and evening skincare routines for skin that is clean clear and amply hydrated. Follow with your favorite Paula's Choice toner, exfoliant, serums, spot treatments and moisturizer.

Paula's Choice products are made with YOUR SKIN in mind. Whatever your skincare concern, whether dryness, acne, fine lines, or sensitive skin; we've got a treatment line for you. The search for amazing skin care ends here. Finally, you found it.
Paula's Choice Skincare makes products that work. No fragrance, no parabens, no fluff. Just effective, science-backed formulas that target any concern from wrinkles to breakouts.
